name: parcel_value_assessed_land
description: Assessed Land Value (before exemptions, if any) as provided by the county or local taxing/assessment authority.

name: parcel_value_assessed_imprv
description: Assessed Improvement Values (before exemptions, if any) as provided by the county or local taxing/assessment authority.

name: parcel_use_code
description: Local/Municipal Use Code of a property.

name: parcel_year_built
description: Year the primary structure on the property was built.

name: parcel_building_number
description: Total number of buildings or structures on a single parcel as reported on the assessment roll.

name: parcel_building_sqft
description: Building area of the primary structure on the property. If there are multiple residential units this is primarily the area of the largest residential structure.

name: parcel_stories
description: Number of stories of the main structure on the property.

name: parcel_basement_desc
description: Type of basement found in the building.

name: parcel_unit_count
description: Number of units on the property.

name: parcel_land_sqft
description: Size of the property in square feet, derived from the assessment record when possible, otherwise calculated from associated parcel geometry.
